question: Who is authorised to make any provision for reservation of seats in any panchayat or offices of chairperson in the panchayat at any level in favour of backward classes?
explanation:
The legislature of a stateÂ  is authorised by 73rd amendment act to make any provision for reservation of seats in any panchayat or offices of
chairperson in the panchayat at any level in favour of backward classes.
